fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Transport two players. If they belong to the same faction, their roles are switched as well.
- Reverse reroll someone. If they manually rerolled to their current role, they will be turned back into whichever roll they manually rerolled from. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The game begins on Day 5. While you're alive, each subsequent phase progresses backwards. If the game goes past Day 1, it ends.
- If you survive until the end of the game, all non-Neutrals immediately lose.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game having successfully used your reverse reroll once.
